overlay--blur-xs[before].title: Subtle backdrop blur
overlay--blur-xs[before].description: Applies a subtle 2px blur to the background behind the element.

overlay--blur-sm[before].title: Small backdrop blur
overlay--blur-sm[before].description: Applies a light 5px blur to the background behind the element.

overlay--blur-md[before].title: Medium backdrop blur
overlay--blur-md[before].description: Applies a moderate 10px blur to the background behind the element.

overlay--blur-lg[before].title: Large backdrop blur
overlay--blur-lg[before].description: Applies a strong 15px blur to the background behind the element.

overlay--blur-xl[before].title: Extra large backdrop blur
overlay--blur-xl[before].description: Applies a heavy 20px blur to the background behind the element.

overlay--blur-xxl[before].title: Huge backdrop blur
overlay--blur-xxl[before].description: Applies an intense 25px blur to the background behind the element.
